titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the true payment of tythes and other duties, and for continuance of an ordinance of the ninth of August, 1647. Die Veneris, 27 Octob. 1648. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that this ordinance for the true payment of tythes, and other duties, be forthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iohn Wright, at the King-Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
